    • Method Detail

      • init

        public int init(int[] gpio)
        Initialize the GPIO interface of the FT4222H. Please note the GPIO interface is available on the 2nd USB interface in mode 0 or on the 4th USB interface in mode 1.
        Specified by:
        init in interface Gpio
        Parameters:
        gpio - An array defines the directions of 4 GPIO pins. The GPIO direction will be: GPIO_OUTPUT GPIO_INPUT
        Returns:
        FT4222_OK if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • read

        public int read(int portNum,
       boolean[] bValue)
        Read the value from the specified GPIO pin.
        Specified by:
        read in interface Gpio
        Parameters:
        portNum - One of the following GPIO ports: GPIO_PORT0 GPIO_PORT1 GPIO_PORT2 GPIO_PORT3
        bValue - A variable of typeBOOL which receives the value of the GPIO pin.
        Returns:
        FT4222_OK if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.

      • write

        public int write(int portNum,
        boolean bValue)
        Write value to the specified GPIO pin.
        Specified by:
        write in interface Gpio
        Parameters:
        portNum - One of the following GPIO ports: GPIO_PORT0 GPIO_PORT1 GPIO_PORT2 GPIO_PORT3
        bValue - The output value.
        Returns:
        FT4222_OK if successful, otherwise the return value is an FT error code.
